meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a queen.
meanings.sent1: Her elegant dress was queenlike in its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The crown on her head made her look queenlike.
meanings.sent3: She walked with a queenlike grace, turning heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent4: The grand castle stood on the hill, a queenlike presence in the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The majestic swan glided across the lake, its movements queenlike and regal.

meanings.definition: In a manner befitting a queen.
meanings.sent1: She waved queenlike to the crowd from the balcony.
meanings.sent2: The queenlike manner in which she carried herself impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: He tried to imitate her queenlike walk but ended up looking silly.
meanings.sent4: The music played softly, setting a queenlike atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun set in a blaze of colors, painting the sky in a queenlike display.
